  • Method Details

    • getWorkingHours

      WorkingHours getWorkingHours() throws RemoteException
      Returns:
      the current working hours (open/close schedule) as a WorkingHours object
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • setOpeningHours

      void setOpeningHours(String openingTime) throws RemoteException
      Parameters:
      openingTime - expects a String with the format of "HH:mm" to represent the new opening time for the store
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the format of the String is invalid or if the desired opening hours are after the closing hours
      RemoteException

    • setClosingHours

      void setClosingHours(String closingTime) throws RemoteException
      Parameters:
      closingTime - expects a String with the format of "HH:mm" to represent the new closing time for the store
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the format of the String is invalid or if the desired closing hours are before the opening hours
      RemoteException

    • getCheckoutsToday

      String getCheckoutsToday() throws RemoteException
      Returns:
      the number of checkouts having the date set to the current day
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • getItemsToday

      String getItemsToday() throws RemoteException
      Returns:
      the number of items * quantity from the checkouts having the date set to the current day
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • getSalesToday

      String getSalesToday() throws RemoteException
      Returns:
      the income given all the items * quantity from the checkouts having the date set to the current day
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • getCheckoutsThisMonth

      String getCheckoutsThisMonth() throws RemoteException
      Returns:
      the number of checkouts having the date within 30 days in the past from the current day
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • getItemsThisMonth

      String getItemsThisMonth() throws RemoteException
      Returns:
      the number of items * quantity from the checkouts having the date within 30 days in the past from the current day
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • getSalesThisMonth

      String getSalesThisMonth() throws RemoteException
      Returns:
      the income given all the items * quantity checkouts having the date within 30 days in the past from the current day
      Throws:
      RemoteException
